awd_titl_txt: Support of Planning for the International Geosphere-        Biosphere Program (IGBP)
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator will chair the Special Committee (SCGB) for          the International Geosphere-Biosphere Program (IGBP) of the Internation-        al Council of Scientific Unions (ICSU).  This Committee is developing           plans for international implementation of the IGBP, in conjunction with         a series of national IGBP Committees establshied in the major countries         expected to participate in the IGBP.  The Special Committee has establi-        shed a series of panels and working groups to initiate and complete             plans for specific components of the IGBP.  The present award is to im-         prove the capabilities of the Chairman to communicate and interact with         the memebers of the Committee and with the Committee's Panels and Work-         ing Groups.  The award will permit the acquisition of equipment for such        communications and limited travel by the Chairman to participate direct-        ly in meetings and related planning activities of the panels and working        groups.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: PRESIDENT AND FELLOWS OF HARVARD COLLEGE
